member.name: T:RGN.Modules.SignIn.GuestSignInModule
member.summary: This module is used to create guest accounts for the users After creating the guest anonymous account you can store the data in the cloud Later when an email account is created, the user data will be merged to the email account.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.SignIn.GuestSignInModule.TryToSignInAsync(RGN.Modules.SignIn.Models.RGNGuestSignInCallbackDelegate)
member.summary: Tries to sign in with anonymous account to Ready Games Network (RGN)
member.param: The callback that should be called once the signIn will be completed

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.SignIn.GuestSignInModule.SignOut
member.summary: Signs the user out from RGN
